channel.title: Does Hamachi work to connect people to your 317 server?
channel.description: [b]Ok, I was just wondering if it does, because, my friend wants to play my server but he doesn't want to download my client untill he is sure it will work. If it does work, what IP do you use? The one that is at the top of Hamachi? Post any details on this post, please! :D :D :D :D ;D ;D ;D ;D[/b]

item.title: Does Hamachi work to connect people to your 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

Yes use the the ip on the damn top, maybe you should TRY it before posting useless questions.
Sheesh.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Hamachi work to connect people to your 317 server?

item.title: Does Hamachi work to connect people to your 317 server?
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

Newty:

Yes, you can use Hamachi to have your friend connect to your server.

You didn’t completely answer my question.
